backend/main.mo: Defines product, user, and order types with access-controlled CRUD logic for profiles, products, and orders using role-based authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files describing styling, components, hooks, and UI behavior.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer with CSS variables defining light/dark theme tokens and global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint loading Tailwind, fonts, import maps, and mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing auth, role-based views, layout, modals, and rendering hero, product grid, admin or vendor sections.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPanel: Admin dashboard with tabbed UI for managing products and adding new ones.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminProdu: Displays all products with loading states, availability toggles, delete actions, and confirmation workflow.
frontend/src/components/admin/ConfirmDia: Reusable confirmation dialog component with loading state using AlertDialog primitives.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductFor: Renders a form to create a new product with validation and submits via useCreateProduct. Resets fields and triggers success handling after creation.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Displays a login/logout button that handles Internet Identity auth and shows appropriate icons and states. Clears queries on logout and retries if user is already authenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LogoLoginCh: A popover allowing users to choose customer or vendor mode and trigger login. Positions itself relative to a logo anchor and closes on outside click or escape.
frontend/src/components/auth/ModeSelecto: Provides a tab UI to switch between customer and vendor auth modes. Updates global mode state via useAuthMode.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: A modal that prompts for a user's name and saves their profile via useSaveCallerUserProfile. Shows success or error notifications on submit.
frontend/src/components/brand/Logo.tsx: Displays the MyLocal Kart logo with optional click behavior. Can render as a button or static element based on props.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai. Includes a small animated heart and year display.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Displays the app header with logo, role badges, cart button, and login button. Handles opening login chooser and cart sheet based on user state.
frontend/src/components/storefront/CartS: Implements the cart sidebar with item management, availability checks, and checkout flow. Shows order confirmation after successful checkout and handles payment method selection.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Order: Displays order confirmation details including metadata, item list, totals, and a continue button.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Produ: Renders a product card with image, price, stock status, and add‑to‑cart logic.
Fetches and displays product lists with admin toggles for all vs available products and loading/error states.
frontend/src/components/storefront/Store: Static hero section with marketing text and a hero image for the storefront.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorPor: Vendor dashboard with tabs for managing products and adding new ones.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorPro: Form for vendors to create products, handling validation and submission to backend.
Displays vendor products with controls for availability toggling and deletion, handling loading/error states.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useAuthMode.ts: Stores and retrieves the app auth mode (customer/vendor) from localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerProfile: Fetches the current user's profile via the actor, managing loading and availability state.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useCallerRole.ts: Retrieves the caller's role and exposes convenience booleans for role checks and auth state.
frontend/src/hooks/auth/useSaveProfile.t: Defines a mutation to save the caller’s user profile and invalidates related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/cart/useCart.tsx: Implements a React context for managing cart items with add, remove, update, subtotal, and total helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/orders/useCheckout.ts: Provides a checkout mutation that validates the cart and triggers an actor checkout call while refreshing order data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor instance and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity loading using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains product-related queries and mutations including fetch, create, delete, and toggle availability.
frontend/src/hooks/vendor/useVendorProdu: Fetches products associated with the logged-in vendor’s principal using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles and theme variables including dark mode and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, wrapping it in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Formats numeric or bigint prices into INR currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom theme extensions (fonts, oklch colors, radii, shadows), and animations using typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state definition containing app summary, architecture notes, known issues, image requirements, and feature metadata for the MyLocal Kart build.
